member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.TestItemBase.FileUploadTree
member.summary: Inner Dictionary Uses Teacher Instruction etc.. as Key. Inner Dictionary uses Image File Name to be uploaded as the Value. Outer Dictionary Uses True or False (boolean) as Key to indicate WithFileUpload or WithoutFileUpload. To be used like PointValueTree.

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.TestRubric.Levels
member.summary: Shouldn't be set unless specifically not using the default # of levels. This gets set if its null to the number of default levels.

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.TestRubric.NumberOfHeaders
member.summary: If the rubric isn't using headers, return 0. Otherwise return the number of headers.

member.name: M:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.IHaveFirstNameLastNameExtensions.GetName(Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.IHaveFirstNameLastName)
member.summary: gets and sets the name in the form 'lastname','firstname'

member.name: M:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.IHaveFirstNameLastNameExtensions.SetName(Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.IHaveFirstNameLastName,System.String)
member.summary: set the first and last name with provided last name, first name string

member.name: T:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser

member.summary: parameterless constructor

member.name: M:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: contructior with username and password

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.Id
member.summary: primary key for this user. USed for a number of quiery string parameters on pages like edituser.aspx

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.Key
member.summary: Alternate integer key (also unique)

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.FirstName
member.summary: SchoolNet user's First Name

member.summary: SchoolNet user's Last Name

member.summary: SchoolNet user's login UserName

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.Password
member.summary: SchoolNet user's Password, usually set to match the default admin password

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.IsPasswordChanged
member.summary: SchoolNet user has change the default password

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.DefaultInstitution
member.summary: The user's default institution. this is the state, district, region or school that the user is logged into by default, the users's "home" institution

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.DefaultSubInstitution
member.summary: The user's default subinstitution. May not be filled out. if it is, then the default institution is the parent instituction of this one.

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.DefaultRole
member.summary: The default role that this user occupies at his/her default institution

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.OtherRoles
member.summary: Other institution/role combinations assigned to this user

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.MiddleName
member.summary: SchoolNet user's Middle Name

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.CalledName
member.summary: SchoolNet Called Name

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.Prefix
member.summary: suffix part of SchoolNet user's Name i.e. 'Mr.','Ms.','Mrs.' etc.

member.name: P:Schoolnet.SeleniumDTOs.SchoolnetUser.Suffix
member.summary: suffix part of SchoolNet user's Name i.e. 'Jr.','Sr.','Esq.' etc.

member.summary: SchoolNet user's Gender
